name: Silva Compass Ranger S
description: A compact sighting compass that's easy to read and super-reliable. The mirror folds down over the compass to make convenient, compact package.0°-360-degree luminous dial markings with large numerals at every 20-degrees are easy to read in challenging conditions.1:25:000 and 1:50:000 scales and centimeter/millimetre rules.Sighting mirror for plotting routes, can be used in emergencies for signalling.Scale lanyard (1:25k and 1:50k) takes guessing out of plotting, and as a break-away lanyard it's safe and convenient.DryFlex™ rubberized bezel is easy to use with or without gloves.Clear baseplate for easy mapping and plotting.Declination scale.
